text: Ronald Martinez / Getty Images This feature is a part of our Most Influential People Behind The Scenes In Sports series. Erin Andrews has managed to do what only a handful of broadcasters have ever done â€” leave ESPN and became more popular than ever. She's one of the faces of Fox Sports 1. Everyone, ESPN especially, is trying to find the next Erin Andrews. When you look back at her career arc, though, you see she had to put it a lot of hard work before she exploded in popularity.
